title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Open Internet
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Open Internet 

Access) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 9 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (open internet access) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 9 june 2023

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Union (Open Internet Access) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Open Internet Access) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 

343 of 2019) are amended by - 

(a) 

the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 8: 

“8. An undertaking shall comply with - 

(a) 

(b) 

its obligations under Articles 3, 4 and 5 of the 
EU Regulation, and 

a direction under Regulation 4(1) within the 
period specified in the direction.”, 

(b) 

the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 11: 

issues a direction or 
“11. (1) Where 
notification under these Regulations, such direction or 
notification shall - 

the Regulator 

(a) 

be in writing, 

(b) 

state the reasons on which it is based, 

(c) 

be addressed to the undertaking concerned, and 

(d) be sent or given as soon as practicable. 

(2) 

Section 60(1) of the Act of 2002 shall apply to a 
direction issued by the Regulator under these Regulations as 
if it were a notice referred to in that section.”, 

and 

1 OJ No. L310, 26.11.2015, p.1 
2 OJ No. L321, 17.12.2018, p.1 
3 OJ No. L321, 17.12.2018, p.36 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 (c) 

the deletion of Regulation 9(4). 

[303] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 June, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [303]
